title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 24.2 - Type of examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 24.2 - Type of examination

State Regulations

All applicants for certification under sections
2202
and
2203
of the Insurance Law must take the life insurance agents' examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
24.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
